messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: A mid-night brawL was reported by multiple residents in Oakridge community. Detective Jansen reviewed the incident with Deputie Lee, who was on night patrolling when the fight broke out. Datective Jared arrived late, apparently mixed up about the location. Lieutenant Robins, had contacted the local hospital, ensuring any injured parties were promptly attended. During the chaos, it was revealed that Sergeant Brooks had been undercover, mingling with a possible gang. Offiser Faraday made several arrests, even though he'd just returned from annual leave. Criminalists Danier was sUmmoned to collect and analyse evidence, especially since the scene was tainted. Patrol Officer Mott stayed back, managing the crowd and the media presence. The papers had an exaggerated account, with the main source being Technician Stephanie, who mistakenly talked with journalists. Finally, Officer Gills coordinated with residents to give their statements, while Detective Frells was tasked with interrogating the arrested individuals. DOCUMENT VERIFICAŤION by officalL PENDALE police station. PRODUCTIOn NUMBER 01452 - At 12. PROCESSING CODE: XXXYYYZZ. The photographs were taken by an anonymous source and later revealed by Sergean Smith, despite the unclear chain of custody.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective Jansen Officer Context: Reviewed the Oakridge community midnight brawl incident. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Deputy Lee Officer Context: Was on night patrolling during the breakout of the fight. Officer Role: Deputy  Officer Name: Detective Jared Officer Context: Arrived late at the scene, had a location mix up. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Lieutenant Robins Officer Context: Contacted local hospital for the injured from the brawl. Officer Role: Lieutenant  Officer Name: Sergeant Brooks Officer Context: Was undercover at the scene, mingling with a potential gang. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Officer Faraday Officer Context: Made arrests post his return from annual leave. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Criminalists Danier Officer Context: Summonsed to collect and analyze evidence from the tainted scene. Officer Role: Criminalist  Officer Name: Patrol Officer Mott Officer Context: Managed crowd and media post the brawl. Officer Role: Patrol Officer  Officer Name: Technician Stephanie Officer Context: Mistakenly spoke with journalists, leading to exaggerated news accounts. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Officer Gills Officer Context: Coordinated with Oakridge residents for their statements on the incident. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Detective Frells Officer Context: Tasked with interrogating the arrested individuals. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Sergean Smith Officer Context: Revealed photographs from an anonymous source regarding the brawl. Officer Role: Sergeant
